definition: to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: She was an auditor and worked for an auctioneer.
sentences.chinese: 她是名查賬員併爲一名拍賣商工作。

sentences.english: The auctioneer was a silver-tongued man from Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 那位拍賣商是一位出生於亞拉巴馬州的雄辯家。

sentences.english: She did so, but his attorney attributed it to her fault.
sentences.chinese: 她這樣做了，但拍賣商的辯護律師把罪歸因於她的錯。
